newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese bonds firmer, spreads vs Bunds 50 bp.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese bonds firmer, spreads vs Bunds 50 bp.

text.p: Portuguese bond futures and cash ended firmer as spreads against 10-year Bunds remained steady at a record low of 50 basis points (bp), dealers said.
"The market ended with firm support, although not as strong as Spain," said one operator. "We closed consolidating the 50 bps yield spread against 10-year Bunds."
A dealer said: "The negative spread against Spain diminished. The performance of Bonos was comparatively better, but the main focus is on Bunds."
Dealers said the forthcoming French elections had had no impact on the Portuguese bond market.
